data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 2,488 believers in Satkhira and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Satkhira, Khulna, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Satkhira, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Satkhira, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, for those in trouble in the county of Satkhira prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Satkhira to agree with you and with one another.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Mir people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Satkhira, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Satkhira, Khulna, Bangladesh.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,986,000 people living in Satkhira.
